item.title: Realy need help [317]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“Austin., post:3, topic:335264”]So you’re saying the interface comes up before you tele or even when your not a donor, it comes up?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“donatorzone”) && (donator >= 1)) {
height = 0;
toX = 3233;
toY = 9315;
String name = command.substring(5);
if (donator >= 1){
sendQuest("~Mystic-Scape Donatorzone rules~", 8144); //Title
sendQuest(“If ur in the Donatorzone always wear a donator cape!”, 8145);
sendQuest(“Don’t sell or give the Donator stuff away!”, 8146);
sM(“Welcome to the donator zone!”);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}
}[/quote]
no i mean that when u tele to the donatorzone. (only donator possible) sends a frame with the rules in that zone. but with the code that i got now, it opens up before it teles, and you can see the frame only 1 sec then i tele you and the frame is gone.

Read full topic

item.title: Realy need help [317]
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("donatorzone") && (donator >= 1)) { height = 0; toX = 3233; toY = 9315; String name = command.substring(5); if (donator >= 1){ sendQuest("~Mystic-Scape Donatorzone rules~", 8144); //Title sendQuest("If ur in the Donatorzone always wear a donator cape!", 8145); sendQuest("Don't sell or give the Donator stuff away!", 8146); sM("Welcome to the donator zone!"); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } } else sM("FUCK YOU BIATCH YOUR NOT A DONATOR"); }

or

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("donatorzone") && (donator >= 1)) { height = 0; toX = 3233; toY = 9315; String name = command.substring(5); if (donator >= 1){ sendQuest("~Mystic-Scape Donatorzone rules~", 8144); //Title sendQuest("If ur in the Donatorzone always wear a donator cape!", 8145); sendQuest("Don't sell or give the Donator stuff away!", 8146); sM("Welcome to the donator zone!"); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } else sM("FUCK YOU BIATCH YOUR NOT A DONATOR"); }

Not sure which one will work for you

item.title: Realy need help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Austin4 Austin.
item.description:
@Austin4 wrote:

So you’re saying the interface comes up before you tele or even when your not a donor, it comes up?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“donatorzone”) && (donator >= 1)) {
height = 0;
toX = 3233;
toY = 9315;
String name = command.substring(5);
if (donator >= 1){
sendQuest("~Mystic-Scape Donatorzone rules~", 8144); //Title
sendQuest(“If ur in the Donatorzone always wear a donator cape!”, 8145);
sendQuest(“Don’t sell or give the Donator stuff away!”, 8146);
sM(“Welcome to the donator zone!”);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Realy need help [317]
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

have it not as a trigger tele?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“donatorzone”) && (donator >= 1)) {
height = 0;
toX = 3233;
toY = 9315;
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest("~Mystic-Scape Donatorzone rules~", 8144); //Title
sendQuest(“If ur in the Donatorzone always wear a donator cape!”, 8145);
sendQuest(“Don’t sell or give the Donator stuff away!”, 8146);
sM(“Welcome to the donator zone!”);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}

Although, you may want to add in the restrictions from trigger tele to it, just so you can’t use it to escape wild or the jad area

item.title: Realy need help [317]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

well i got a donatorzone with shops and stuff but i want if u tele to the donatorzone that after u do tele u are there there need to come up a frame. but with my code now it opens before the tele so it go away once ur there how can i change here is my code:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("donatorzone") && (donator >= 1)) { triggerTele(3233, 9315, 0); String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("~Mystic-Scape Donatorzone rules~", 8144); //Title sendQuest("If ur in the Donatorzone always wear a donator cape!", 8145); sendQuest("Don't sell or give the Donator stuff away!", 8146); sM("Welcome to the donator zone!"); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
